text: @IngrahamAngle They will totally ignore the entire state, it will not be news in their eyes. Only negativity is newsworthy. Gov Kemp is Republican, he could cure COVID-19 w/Pelosi’s ice cream & you wouldn’t hear a peep from the media. The # moves up by 1 & they will jump on him w/cloven hooves.
